channel.title: Minneapolis on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Minneapolis on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Analysing the Minneapolis shooting frame by frame
item.description: BBC Verify has analysed footage of the shooting from multiple angles, piecing together a detailed picture of what happened.

item.title: Immigration chief departing Minneapolis as Trump sends border tsar Tom Homan to scene
item.description: The decision may indicate that the administration is walking back more aggressive immigration enforcement.

item.title: NRA and other US gun activists push back at Trump officials over Minneapolis shooting
item.description: The gun-lobby group, typically aligned with Trump, criticises a suggestion that those who carry guns risk being lawfully shot.

item.title: Trump abandons attack mode as Minneapolis shooting backlash grows
item.description: The White House has shifted how it talks about Alex Pretti’s killing as more Republicans express concern over the deadly encounter.

item.title: What we know about fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis
item.description: Trump officials says federal agents shot in self-defence, as Pretti’s parents accuse them of “sickening lies”.

item.title: Who was Alex Pretti, the intensive care nurse shot dead in Minneapolis?
item.description: He has been described as an avid outdoorsman who loved mountain biking.

item.title: Trump has 'very good' call with Minneapolis Mayor Frey, announces border czar Homan meeting
item.description: President Trump announced a "very good" call with Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey as riots continue amid federal immigration enforcement. Tom Homan will meet with the mayor tomorrow.
